title: mRemoteNg 1.76.20.24615 cannot use MySQL DB 9.4 as connexion storage backend ?
author: jeanbruder
body_snippet:
Dear mRemoteNG team,

As described in the documentation pages on using a database to save the configuration, I want to use MySQL. However, I am unable to connect to it. I have created a database named mRemoteNG and a user named mRemoteNG with full rights to this database. I can connect to it from a tool such as DBeaver, but not from mremoteng. Could you help me with this?

Thank you in advance, Jean
